text: Azamgarh State University (Hindi: आजमगढ़ राज्य विश्वविद्यालय) is a state university in Azamgarh, Uttar Pradesh, India established by The Uttar Pradesh State Universities (Amendment) Act, 2019. It is expected to open in 2021–22. It will give affiliation to all government and private degree colleges in the districts of Azamgarh and Mau who are currently affiliated with Veer Bahadur Singh Purvanchal University. ==References== ==External links== *University act Category:Proposed organizations Category:Universities in Uttar Pradesh Category:Education in Azamgarh Category:Proposed infrastructure in Uttar Pradesh
title: Azamgarh State University
